response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from us at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

This offer is designed to provide you with an attractive discount while ensuring a swift and seamless transaction. I understand that acquiring such a valuable asset might require careful consideration, and I am here to answer any questions or address any concerns you may have. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
